## Code Reviews

This PR adds a new definition, so it needs to be reviewed by a DT maintainer before it can be merged.

You can test the changes of this PR [in the Playground](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play/?dtPR=67090&install-plugin=playground-dt-review).
